channel.title: How would I make Jad hit higher?
channel.description: Im using Devo 7 and my jad only hits 0's! Can someone please help me to find out to make him hit 40+?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2009, 06:00:02 pm[/size][hr]Anyone help please?

item.title: How would I make Jad hit higher?
item.dc:creator: @RID22 RID22
item.description:
@RID22 wrote:

All I see is stuff like this:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 114) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 359; } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 86) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 138; } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1125) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1142;

item.title: How would I make Jad hit higher?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

are you sure he only hits 0’s or is r u praying? uhm well basically go to your, npcHandler. then search-

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType

and youll see stuff like :

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2743) { // ket-zek rand_npc = misc.random(400); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad rand_npc = misc.random(500); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2746) { // yt-hurkot rand_npc = misc.random(50);
simply copy and paste one statment and change its id to jads which is 2745.
and then where it says misc.random(500), is that percent of what its hit chance is(i believe), put it to what u want.
then search:hitDiff = misc.random

and you should see the same stuff as above but the bottem statment says hit diff, which is its highest hit.
this is jads:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad hitDiff = misc.random(99); }

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make Jad hit higher?
